ygData.subject: Dyllin Starsine
ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard that Dyllin not only spawns in HH, but he also occasionally spawns at the lake in west comm. does anyone know how to trigger this spawn. we have
ygData.messageBody:
I have heard that Dyllin not only spawns in HH, but he
also occasionally spawns at the lake in west comm.

does anyone know how to trigger this spawn.

we have tried talking to Lady Shae and using the
"Dyllin" keyword. But he hasnt showed yet. That stupid
Mojax keeps popping up though. We have already killed
him enough times :)


or do you have to turn in his note, talk to shae, then
see if he spawns. problem is, now, we cant talk to
shae. before that last patch we could, even though she
was threatening. so theres no way we can trigger her
without a mule, and a mule most likely wouldnt do it
if Mojax's note in needed.

thanks for any info


Bathory D'Allatu
